title: ICSI CSEET June 2026 Registration Deadline Extended!
content:
# ICSI CSEET June 2026 Registration Deadline Extended!

Ek important update hai. The Institute of Company Secretaries of India (ICSI) ne Company Secretary Executive Entrance Test (CSEET) June 2026 session ke registration ki last date extend karne ka announcement kiya hai. This is a crucial update for all aspiring Company Secretaries.

Here are the key details:
*   **New Registration Due Date:** Candidates can now register for the CSEET June 2026 session until **February 28, 2026**.
*   **Exam Dates:** The CSEET June 2026 examination will be conducted from **June 1, 2026, to June 4, 2026**, in a centre-based, offline mode.
*   **Enrollment Window (without late fee):** The window for submitting exam enrollment without a late fee is from March 1, 2026, to April 7, 2026.
*   **Enrollment Window (with late fee):** For those who miss the initial enrollment period, the option to enroll with a late fee will be available from April 8, 2026, to April 20, 2026.

This extension, reported on February 18, 2026, provides an additional opportunity for aspirants to complete their registration. Make sure to complete the online application process on the official ICSI portal, smash.icsi.edu, before the revised deadline.
